caption.p:
Rb3 regulated the TGF- β signal pathway in GP-293 cells. (a) Western blotting for the expression of TGF- β, Smad2, and Smad3 and phosphorylation of Smad2 and Smad3. (b–e) Quantitative analysis of densitometry for TGF- β (b), p-Smad2 (c), Smad2 (d), p-Smad3 (e), and Smad3 (f).
∗∗
p < 0.01 and
∗∗∗
p < 0.001 compared to the control group, and # p < 0.05, ## p < 0.01, and ### p < 0.001 compared to the CPT group.
